TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Hamad_bin_Isa_bin_Salman_Al_Khalifa, title = Hamad_bin_Isa_bin_Salman_Al_Khalifa, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hamad_bin_Isa_bin_Salman_Al_Khalifa} }

S.FORM: = Hamad bin Isa bin Salman Al Khalifa = Mntucing hngkawas 1950 idas 1 jiyax 28 ka Hamad bin Isa bin Salman Al Khalifa ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bukung klwaan Bahrain ta sayang o kiya ka Hamad bin Isa bin Salman Al Khalifa, pnaah hngkawas 1999 idas 3 jiyax 6 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. Seho Hamayto.Pun.Isa.Pun.Sroman.Aroharihwa(kari Arapo: ,Knkawas1950 idas 1 ali 28-), KCMG we heya ka kowang saya ka Paring wangko(prading kndalax knkawas 2002). Heya we laqi na berah Paring wangko ka Aymiar-isa.Pun.Saroman.Aroharihwa, knkawas 1999, mhuqil ka tama na, ma, heya ka rmirih mgAymir, kndalax knkawas 2002 de, pryuxun na mesa kowang di. Kndusan na Sriso Hamayto nii ge, knkawas 1950 idas 1 ali 28 we, mntuting quri hunac na tunux alang Maynamay ka Rihuwa. Riso hari de, malix muuyas sapah pyasan Raysu kawcong nInko-cencyaw. Bobo na, musa muuyas Hwancya-cunsu seyen nInko ka Santohosuto ma, musa muuyas cunsu-seyen nDame ka Raywunwosupaw dungan. Meyah alang de, pheyu supi nParing-kwohwangcin ka Hamayto. Knkawas 1964, tama na ge, heya ka mpstange mmaha kowang, bobo na de, heya ka mpdudul ucwang-putwe nParing. Knkawas 1971, wada na pdlaxan ka qlhangan Inkwo ma, turi di, Hamayto de kwohwang-tacun ka heya. Qmlahang Knkawas 1999 idas 3 ali 6, wada mhuqil tama na Hamayto ka Isa-Aymiar, ma, Hamayto ka smriyux tloong tloongan kwowang, heya ka tgdaha kwowang nParing-kwo, ma, heya na ka tgbaro bale mdudul Paring kwohwang-cun ma, mpdudul supi bale. Heya ka tloong tloongan kwowang de, lmutuc naq qqlahang na ka Hamayto kwowang, kika qtaan ka ndaan na qmlahang. Hamayto nii ge, egu bale qpryuxan na ka cencu-ringyu, kana so snuwa ka qnnaqah na kesun cencuhwan, biqun na beyax psgao pheyu qbsuran ka mqedil, ma, pooda yihwe-senci. Snuwa na qnnaqah kesun taso we, qrasun riyung laalang ka Hamayto, knryuxan na kesun " rencen riso-sing suci ".

= Hamad bin Isa bin Salman Al Khalifa = Mntocing hngkawas 1950 idas 1 jiyax 28 ka Hamad bin Isa bin Salman Al Khalifa ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bokong klwaan Bahrain ta sayang o kiya ka Hamad bin Isa bin Salman Al Khalifa, pnaah hngkawas 1999 idas 3 jiyax 6 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. Seho Hamayto.Pon.Isa.Pon.Sroman.Aroharihwa(kari Arapo: ,Knkawas1950 idas 1 ali 28-), KCMG we heya ka kowang saya ka Paring wangko(prading kndalax knkawas 2002). Heya we laqi na berah Paring wangko ka Aymiar-isa.Pon.Saroman.Aroharihwa, knkawas 1999, mhoqil ka tama na, ma, heya ka rmirih mgAymir, kndalax knkawas 2002 de, pryoxon na mesa kowang di. Kndosan na Sriso Hamayto nii ge, knkawas 1950 idas 1 ali 28 we, mntoting qori honac na tonox alang Maynamay ka Rihowa. Riso hari de, malix mooyas sapah pyasan Rayso kawcong nInko-cencyaw. Bobo na, mosa mooyas Hwancya-conso seyen nInko ka Santohosoto ma, mosa mooyas conso-seyen nDame ka Raywonwosopaw dongan. Meyah alang de, pheyo sopi nParing-kwohwangcin ka Hamayto. Knkawas 1964, tama na ge, heya ka mpstange mmaha kowang, bobo na de, heya ka mpdodol ocwang-potwe nParing. Knkawas 1971, wada na pdlaxan ka qlhangan Inkwo ma, tori di, Hamayto de kwohwang-tacon ka heya. Qmlahang Knkawas 1999 idas 3 ali 6, wada mhoqil tama na Hamayto ka Isa-Aymiar, ma, Hamayto ka smriyox tloong tloongan kwowang, heya ka tgdaha kwowang nParing-kwo, ma, heya na ka tgbaro bale mdodol Paring kwohwang-con ma, mpdodol sopi bale. Heya ka tloong tloongan kwowang de, lmotoc naq qqlahang na ka Hamayto kwowang, kika qtaan ka ndaan na qmlahang. Hamayto nii ge, ego bale qpryoxan na ka cenco-ringyo, kana so snowa ka qnnaqah na keson cencohwan, biqon na beyax psgao pheyo qbsoran ka mqedil, ma, pooda yihwe-senci. Snowa na qnnaqah keson taso we, qrason riyong laalang ka Hamayto, knryoxan na keson " rencen riso-sing soci ".
